casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Sam S. FOX, Appellant. No. 319. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 5, 1937. Samuel W. Altman, of New York City, for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Curtis Charles Shears, Asst. U. S. Atty., and Maxwell S. McKnight, Sp. Asst, to the U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
